"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."

Todo is an opensource project, the source code is available at https://github.com/brad007/Todo.\n\nTodo was created with the help of a 3rd party library, MaterialDateTimePicker which can be found at https://github.com/wdullaer/MaterialDateTimePicker
